[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /net/obj/http.c

A simple HTTP/1.0 complaint browser for retrieving web pages.

Written by Taffyd

Started 13/11/2001

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/object.c and /net/inherit/client.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/network.h and /include/socket_errors.h
